explanation: The report is correct. In OS_ModuleSymbolLookup_Impl the local pointer 'impl' is only used to read the module record (impl->dl_handle) and is not used to modify the record, so it can and should be declared to point to a const-qualified type (e.g. const OS_impl_module_internal_record_t *impl) to comply with MISRA C 2023 Rule 8.13. Assigning the result of OS_OBJECT_TABLE_GET (an address of a non-const global) to a pointer-to-const is allowed, and using impl->dl_handle after making impl point to a const-qualified struct is fine (the expression becomes a top-level-const pointer value which can be passed to the existing void * parameter without changing the pointed-to type). Therefore the code as written violates the recommendation in Rule 8.13.
